import { BiCalendarMinus, BiCalendarPlus } from "react-icons/bi"; import { useState } from "react"; const AddAppointment = ({ lastId, onSendAppointment }) => { const clearData = { ownerName: "", petName: "", aptDate: "", aptTime: "", aptNotes: "", }; let [toggleForm, setToggleForm] = useState(false); let [formData, setFormData] = useState(clearData); const { ownerName, petName, aptDate, aptTime, aptNotes } = formData; function formDataPublish() { const appointmentInfo = { id: lastId + 1, ownerName: formData.ownerName, petName: formData.petName, aptDate: formData.aptDate + " " + formData.aptTime, aptNotes: formData.aptNotes, }; onSendAppointment(appointmentInfo); setFormData(clearData); setToggleForm(!toggleForm); } const onHandleInputChange = (fieldName) => (event) => { event.preventDefault(); setFormData({ ...formData, [fieldName]: event.target.value }); }; return (
{toggleForm && (
)}
); }; export default AddAppointment;
